channel.title: Npc aggression radius? 317 delta
channel.description: How do I change Npc agression radius for a single npc? I've searched NPChandler.java and the only I could find was [code] public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) { switch(npcs[Npc].npcType) {[/code] If I add the npc too that list, he aggros (But the problem is the radius is much too large) If I remove him, he has no aggro radius at all.
